Package hume

Interface Summary
Agent.Factory The agent factory interface contains only the method create to create new agents.
ILearning Interface for classes that implement a learning algorithm.
ILearningObsolete Interface for the learning algorithm that agents use to update the variables that control their behaviour, i.e. the variables localTrustworthiness, marketTrustworthiness, localTrust, maketTrust.
IOutputServices  
IPlotter  
ISimulation  
ISimulationViewStub  
IView  
 

Class Summary
Agent The Agent class defines the agent's properties and their behaviour.
DoubleSidedMatching Matching algorithm for "double sided" matching.
DoubleSidedMatchingTest Test case for the class DoubleSidedMatching.
FairShareTG Class Fair Share Trust Game defines a trust game, where the price to pe paid lies always between the objective costs of the solution and the costs plus the added value.
FairShareTGTest TrustGameTest contains the unit test for trust game.
FrontEnd BSD License
Matching Class Matching is an abstract class that encapsulates the matching algorithm.
MatchingTest Test case for class Matching and its descending classes.
MatchingView  
MatrixMatching Matching algorithm for "matrix matching".
Network The Network class is an abstract class for networks.
NetworkTest Test case for class Network and descendant classes.
PartitionNetwork Class PartitionNetwork defines a partition network topology, where the world is a partition of neighborhods of agents.
PartitionNetworkTest Unit test case for class PartitionNetwork.
PartitionNetworkView PartitionNetworkView displays a partition network on the screen
ReasonablePriceTG The class ReasonablePriceTGdefines a trust game where the price depends on the competence (and thus the expected value) of the supplier.
RND This purpose of class RND is to define one particular random number generator that is to be used throughout the simulation.
RoleModelLearning Role model learning as described in ("Lernen in HUME 1.0", April, 11).
SimpleReenforcementLearningObsolete Implements a very simple reenforcement learning algorithm.
Simulation The Simulation runs and controls the whole simulation.
SimulationDefinition The SimulationDefinition class contains all the information that is required to set up a specific simulation.
SingleSidedMatching Matching algorithm for "single sided" matching.
StatisticsView  
TrustGame  
TrustGameTest  
 

Enum Summary
MatrixMatching.MatchingStates Objects of the local class AgentState store additional information about agents that is determined before the agents are matches.
